comment_body:
Hey /u/blackopera, thanks for contributing to /r/shortscarystories. Unfortunately, your post was removed as it violates our rules:

Bigoted language, hate speech, and slurs are met with a permanent ban on this subreddit.

Please read the sidebar before posting again. If you have questions or concerns, please [message the moderators through modmail](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/shortscarystories&subject=&message=). Thank you!
